kandakatiya galauda margaye dikkumbaura pradeshaye di lori rathayak anathurata lak wimen pudgalayin dedeneku jiwithakshayata path wi thibe.lori rathaya palamak udin gaman kirime di ehi konkrit kada watimen mema anathura sidu wi athi bawa polisiya pawasayi.lori rathaye riyaduruge aparikshakari riya padawima hethuwen mema anathura sidu wi athi bawa kandakatiya polisiya sadahan karayi.
